Definition at line 30 of file ctp_run.cc.

bool CtpRun::EvaluateOptions ( void   )  [virtual]

Process command line options.

Returns:
true to contine, false to stop
EvaluateOptions is called by Run after parsing the command line. return true if everything is ok, false to stop and show help text.

Reimplemented from votca::ctp::QMApplication.

void CtpRun::Initialize ( void   )  [virtual]

Initialize application data.

Initialize is called by run before parsing the command line. All necesassary command line arguments can be added here
